title: Part One: Jim Bowie: The Worst Texan
itunes:title: Part One: Jim Bowie: The Worst Texan
description:
Robert is joined by Billy Wayne Davis to discuss Jim Bowie, the biggest piece of crap in the Old West.

FOOTNOTES:

  1. What became of Jim Bowie's famous knife?
  2. Hero Tales of the American Soldier
  3. Three Roads to the Alamo
  4. The Mysterious Illness of Jim Bowie: How Did He Contribute to His Own Decline?
  5. James Bowie, Big Dealer
  6. Selling the Sandbar: Marketing the Bowie Knife
  7. No Wounds In His Back
  8. Jim Bowie Before the “Gaudy Legend”

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
